name: Cgi-shot-prediction
tagline: GG shot prediction using opencv library
body:
# CGI-SHOT-PREDICTION ## GG shot prediction using opencv library *** Libraries required to compile the source code: * cmake (http://www.cmake.org/download/), version 3.0.X or greater * opencv (http://opencv.org/downloads.html), version 2.4.X or greater Steps to compile source code in Mac/Linux:
  1. Download source code and unzip in DESTINATION_FOLDER
  2. In DESTINATION_FOLDER make a new directory named "build"
  3. cd in to "build" folder
  4. execute the ccmake command as follows: ccmake ../
  5. then execute make command
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
